titleStmt.title: Cæsarion, or, Historical, political, and moral discourses in four days entertainment between two gentlemen, very pleasant and useful for all orders of men whatsoever / English'd by Jos. Walker.
Cesarion ou Entretiens divers. English

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Streater, and are to be sold by John Weld ...,
